name: Yushiko Ang
bio: A certified Pilates Reformer instructor with over 6 years of experience in body alignment, mobility training, and strength-building. Mia is known for her warm personality and progressive class flows that are both safe and challenging for students of all levels.
certifications: Certified Pilates Reformer Instructor - Pilates Method Alliance (PMA)
Bachelor of Science in Kinesiology - University of Malaya
